name: Fists of Fitchburg
description:
Fists of Fitchburg is a comical beat-em-up boxing match game where two Game Design Professors from Fitchburg State University go at it!

Space is enter, W is up, and S is down.

Controls are in-game!

Contributors:

David Marshall-

Producer, Programmer, Implementer, Lead Rigger, Lead Technical Artist, Sound Designer

Tom Nichols-

Musician, 3D Modeler, UI Artist

Lead UI Artist, Background Artist

Lead 3D Modeler, Lead 3D Animator, Sound Editor

3D Modeler, 3D Animator, Technical Artist, Lead UV Mapper + Texturer
